moveinHGAggregator.mainSelect: SELECT a.dbi_original_key_pr AS Contratto, --0 DECODE(a.ctipo, '1', 'P', '3', 'G') AS tipo_contr, --1 p.Account AS Account, --2 apers AS tipo_bp, --3 DECODE(a.caliv, 'Aliquota ordinaria', '01', 'Aliquota ridotta', '02', 'ER') AS tipo_iva, --4 TO_CHAR(p.valid_from, 'YYYYMMDD') AS einzdat, --5 dec_serviceid(b.cdist) AS service, --6 dec_cokey(a.cserv, acatc) AS cokey, --7 dec_gsber(k.ktokl) AS gsber, --8 dec_stagruver_gas(acatc) AS stagruver, --9 dec_ausgrup(p.rete_appartenenenza, p.tipo_fornitura) AS ausgrup , --10 TO_CHAR(p.valid_until, 'YYYYMMDD') AS AUSZDAT, p.pod AS pod FROM v_contratti a, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrgas b, ( SELECT p.DBI_PUNTO_KEY, MIN(p.valid_from) AS valid_from, MAX(p.valid_until) AS valid_until, pod, p.TIPO_FORNITURA, p.RETE_APPARTENENENZA, MAX(DBI_CD_ENTITA_FATT) AS Account FROM dbi_user.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura p /*WHERE dbi_punto_key = 'PR211164'*/ GROUP BY p.DBI_PUNTO_KEY, pod, p.TIPO_FORNITURA, p.RETE_APPARTENENENZA) p, dbi_user.ifc_sap_statopunti t, account_vkp k -- z_tempsv z WHERE a.dbi_original_key_pr = p.dbi_punto_key AND a.dbi_original_key_pr IN ( SELECT cncon FROM z_pr_in_lavorazione_gas) AND a.dbi_original_key_pr = b.dbi_original_key_pr --AND b.ctipo = 1 AND a.cflg9 = k.legacy AND a.dbi_original_key_pr = t.cd_punto AND t.data_cessazione != to_date('31/12/9999', 'dd/mm/yyyy') GROUP BY a.dbi_original_key_pr, --0 DECODE(a.ctipo, '1', 'P', '3', 'G'), --1 p.Account, --2 apers, --3 DECODE(a.caliv, 'Aliquota ordinaria', '01', 'Aliquota ridotta', '02', 'ER'), --4 TO_CHAR(p.valid_from, 'YYYYMMDD'), --5 dec_serviceid(b.cdist), --6 dec_cokey(a.cserv, acatc), --7 dec_gsber(k.ktokl), --8 dec_stagruver_gas(acatc), --9 dec_ausgrup(p.rete_appartenenenza, p.tipo_fornitura), --10 TO_CHAR(p.valid_until, 'YYYYMMDD'), p.pod

moveinHGExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT * FROM moveinh_ever ORDER BY legacy
